channel.title: AI in Brazil on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in AI in Brazil on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering

item.title: Generalist vs Specialist Language Models
item.description: Abstract # We are currently experiencing a paradigm shift in the field of artificial intelligence, where with every new version of a large language model, tasks that once seemed far from being solved are now being addressed.
